getAdornedWordIDs

Return list of adorned word IDs.

Returns:

getSentences

public java.util.List<java.util.List<ExtendedAdornedWord>> getSentences()
Get adorned words as a list of sentences.

Returns:
List of sentences. Each sentence is a list of ExtendedAdornedWord entries. Sentences are returned in reading context order. Only one ExtendedAdornedWord entry is returned for split words.

This method tries to return sentences in as close to their order of appearance in the text as possible. Sentences from intrusive jump tags will generally appear after the text section into which they intrude, and so may be dislodged an arbitrary distance from their actual position in the text.

getExtendedAdornedWord

public ExtendedAdornedWord getExtendedAdornedWord(java.lang.String id)

Parameters:

Returns:
ExtendedAdornedWord for the specified ID. Returns null if ID not found.

getRelatedSplitWordIDs

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRelatedSplitWordIDs(java.lang.String wordID)
Get related adorned word IDs for a word ID of a split word.

Parameters:
wordID - Word ID for which related IDs are wanted.
Returns:
List of related word IDs.

Related word IDs are the word IDs for the other parts of a split word. The returned list includes the given wordID.

For unsplit words, the single given wordID is returned in the list.

Null is returned when the wordID does not exist.

getRelatedSplitWords

public java.util.List<ExtendedAdornedWord> getRelatedSplitWords(ExtendedAdornedWord adornedWordInfo)
Get related adorned words for split words.

Parameters:
adornedWordInfo - Adorned word for which related words are wanted.
Returns:
List of related adorned words.

Related words are those corresponding to the parts of a split word. The returned list includes the given word.

For unsplit words, the single given adorned word is returned in the list.

getAdornedWordIndexByID

public int getAdornedWordIndexByID(java.lang.String id)
Get index for a word ID.

Parameters:
id - The String word ID.
Returns:
Index of word in adorned words list. Returns -1 ID not found.

getSiblingWordIDs

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSiblingWordIDs(java.lang.String wordID)
Get sibling words.

Parameters:
wordID - The word ID of the word for which to find siblings.
Returns:
String list of sibling word IDs. Empty list if no siblings found.

Sibling words have the same parent hard or jump tag.

Parameters:

Returns:

splitPathFull

public java.lang.String[] splitPathFull(java.lang.String path)
Split word path into separate tags.

Parameters:
path - The word path.
Returns:
String array of split XML tags. The trailing "w[]" element is removed.

splitPath

public java.lang.String[] splitPath(java.lang.String path)
Split word path into separate tags.

Parameters:
path - The word path.
Returns:
String array of split XML tags. Both the leading document name tag and the trailing word (w[]) tag are removed.

generateXML

public java.lang.String generateXML(java.lang.String startingWordID,
                                    java.lang.String endingWordID)
Generate XML for selected word IDs.

Parameters:
startingWordID - Starting word ID.
endingWordID - Ending word ID.
Returns:
Reconstituted XML encompassing the selected word IDs. Empty string if one or both of the word IDs is invalid or out of order.
